revised_title: Obituary of Frederick Tom Brooks: A Pioneering Botanist and Plant Pathologist
tldr: Frederick Tom Brooks was a renowned British botanist and plant pathologist who made significant contributions to the fields of mycology and plant pathology. He was a dedicated teacher, researcher, and leader in the botanical community, serving in various roles and receiving numerous honors throughout his career. Brooks is remembered for his work on plant diseases, fungi, and his influence on the development of plant pathology as a discipline.
